poll_list.title: MIP7c3-SP2: Inclusion Poll for Onboarding a Risk Domain Team - June 8, 2020

discourse_list.title: MIP7c3-SP2: Domain Team Onboarding (Risk Domain Team)

content.content: Preamble MIP7c3-SP#: 2 Author(s): Cyrus Younessi (@DonutJr) Contributors: Status: Request for Comments (RFC) Date Applied: 2020-06-01 Date Ratified: <yyyy-mm-dd> --- Domain Role: Risk Domain Team Facilitator Proposed Applicant: Cyrus Younessi  Application Form  Domain Team Introduction  The Risk Domain team has been working for the betterment of the Maker Protocol, starting with Single-Collateral Dai and continuing to this day with Multi-Collateral Dai.  Motivation  A Risk domain team is needed to help maintain and facilitate the Maker Protocol’s risk management duties. Specifically, a risk domain team is responsible for creating frameworks around monetary policy risk and collateral portfolio risk. These frameworks can be used for the calculation of risk parameters that are submitted to Maker governance.  Work Credentials   Work Experience  Head of Risk for the Maker Foundation Director of Research and Trading at Scalar Capital Investment Analyst at Cumberland Mining    Relevant Information   Rocket Chat Account: @cyrus   Github Account: @DonutJr   MakerDAO Forum Account: @Cyrus   Twitter Account: cyounessi1
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal for the onboarding of a Risk Domain Team for the Maker Protocol. The author explains the need for the team and the responsibilities it would have. There is no entirely positive or negative feedback given, but a 3rd party does ask questions and provide constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
